descriptionSet.description: On this advertisement for Kiwi Dark Tan, a pair of shiny shoes can be seen worn by a man, against a red background. Only the lower part of his legs can be seen, wearing formal pants. Below this an illustration of the product can be seen. The blurb of the advertisement describing its uses and benefits is on the left side. Below this is an illustration of a kiwi bird and a mention of the firm's other product which is a white cleaner.

inscription.text: "They're well worn - but they've worn well thanks to Kiwi Dark Tan!" No wonder they've worn well! Wouldn't any shoes, whose leather is daily nourished and cleansed pore-deep with Kiwi Polish! For Kiwi does more than give surface gloss to shoes; its fine smooth wax preserves their youthful elasticity. Begin feeding your shoes with Kiwi to-day. - and, of course, Kiwi White Cleaner In Tube or Block Form For Canvas & Buckskin Footwear Obtainable at all good stores throughout India, and Burma

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.

titleSet.title: An advertisement of Kiwi Dark Tan
